level.title: HIGH level
level.description: This means you may experience increase feelings of worry, create a sense of pressure, drain your energy, and disrupt your sleep patterns.

mediumLevel.title: MEDIUM level
mediumLevel.description: This means you may occasionally feel worried, experience some pressure, notice a slight decrease in energy, and have minor disruptions to your sleep patterns.

normalLevel.title: NORMAL level
normalLevel.description: This means you might rarely feel a bit worried, encounter mild pressure, maintain stable energy, and enjoy mostly consistent sleep patterns.

review.name: Brian Ross
review.text: I have been using this app for six months now. During this time, I have been able to get rid of the habit of putting everything off until the last minute. The app has helped me to organise my time better and start achieving my goals. It has really changed my life for the better.

componentData.title: Liven is the 2025 Best Mobile App Award winner!

list.info: Our plan is designed to help you build your willpower gradually, so you don’t have to rely on your own willpower too much in the beginning. We also provide support and guidance to help you stay motivated throughout the process.
list.title: What if I don't have enough willpower to stick to the plan?

list.info: We understand that life can be hectic, but our plan includes strategies to help you minimize distractions and stay focused on your goals. From setting clear priorities to creating a distraction-free environment, we’ll help you develop habits that promote productivity and lower negative effects.
list.title: What if I have too many distractions in my life?

list.info: Starting anything new can be scary, but our plan is designed to be manageable and easy to follow. We’ll help you break down your goals into small, actionable steps, and provide support and encouragement to help you stay motivated and overcome any obstacles that come up along the way.
list.title: What if I feel overwhelmed about starting this plan?

list.info: Our plan is different from other tools you may have tried because it is evidence-based. We combine proven techniques and strategies, supported by scientific research and developed by field specialists, to give you the best possible chance of success. Unlike other tools, our plan is personalized to address your specific needs and challenges.
list.title: What if I've tried tools before and they haven't worked for me?

componentData.title:
What’s on your mind? 
 Coaches are here to talk.

reviews.text: My coach Piter is always there when I need someone to talk to. That's support I always need!
Didn’t expect a coach to understand me this well. I make a lot of compulsive decisions in life and she’s always available to discuss my options before making any commitments.
Some nights feel overwhelming, but Olivia helps me find calm in minutes.
Best decision I made! Coaching helps me unload my thoughts and break them down in a way that makes sense.

steps.title: Sign up & get started
steps.description: Add coaching to your plan and unlock expert support

steps.title: Chat anytime, anywhere
steps.description: No scheduling, just open the app and talk

steps.title: Track your progress
steps.description: Reflect, learn, and grow with each session

items.body: Our coaches are certified professionals with experience in mental well-being and personal growth.
items.title: Who are the coaches?

items.body: Coaching works through 1-on-1 personalized sessions, where a coach provides advice, guidance, and support based on your individual needs and goals.
items.title: How does coaching work?

items.body: While both coaching and therapy support your personal growth, they serve different purposes. Therapy delves into healing past wounds and treats mental health concerns, whereas coaching is a forward-focused partnership that helps you set goals, build strategies, and accelerate toward the future you want.
items.title: Is coaching same as therapy?

items.body: Our satisfaction rate with the coaching experience is high, but we understand everyone’s needs are different. If the advice doesn't feel right, we'll work with you to find an approach that better suits you. Your well-being is our priority, and we're committed to helping you achieve your goals.
items.title: What if I don’t like the advice?

list.title: It has really changed my life
list.feedback: I have been using this app for six months now. During this time, I have been able to get rid of the habit of putting everything off until the last minute. The app has helped me to organise my time better and start achieving my goals. It has really changed my life for the better.

list.title: Liven is a great self-help tool!
list.feedback: Liven helps me understand why I procrastinate on tasks and how to get free from that. Liven is doing a great job at it. I am very grateful for a tool like Liven.

list.title: Excellent scientific basis!
list.feedback: It was recommended to me by an expert. I tried different apps, but this one hooked me with it scientific background and the simplicity of the interface. It also has lots of useful mini courses, which is perfect for my lifestyle.

list.title: My personal assistant
list.feedback: Liven has become my personal assistant. It helps me keep track of my health and well-being by offering various features such as mediations and time management tips. And It's all easy to use and understand! This is exactly what I was missing.

benefits.title: Our workbook consists of 10 different chapters, including:

benefitsList.text: You'll restore your emotional balance and feel revitalized without burnout or exhaustion
benefitsList.title: 1. Recharge Your Mind

benefitsList.text: You'll reconnect with your physical well-being and feel refreshed without strain or fatigue
benefitsList.title: 2. Feel Your Body

benefitsList.text: You'll strengthen your connections and feel fulfilled without pressure or isolation
benefitsList.title: 3. Connect With Others

benefitsList.text: You'll stay productive and accomplish your goals without stress or overwhelm
benefitsList.title: 4. Get Everything Done

benefitsList.text: You'll simplify your tasks and maintain organization effortlessly over time
benefitsList.title: 5. Streamline Life’s Responsibilities

benefitsList.text: You'll create a harmonious space and keep it structured without constant effort
benefitsList.title: 6. Organize Your Own Environment

benefitsList.text: You'll build sustainable habits and maintain your vitality without unnecessary strain or depletion
benefitsList.title: 7. Get Proactive Practices and Tools
